item.description:
Yeah, you had to go back to work today. And that sucks. But perhaps you can at least join us for a lovely workshop to scare away that case of the Mondays (which is rudely now occurring on a Tuesday).

Thomas and Carl are both going to make themselves feel better by having us read their work. So check it out in the files section!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll try to look conspicuous with our notebooks and stuff.
item.name: Extend Your Long Weekend...With a Workshop!
